mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, mem_id, notice_date, notice_hits from GOGI_NOTICE_BOARD order by notice_no desc LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(notice_no) from gogi_notice_board where notice_no > 0
mapper.update: update gogi_notice_board set notice_hits = notice_hits +1 where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.select: select notice_no_faq, notice_title_faq, notice_content_faq, mem_id, notice_date_faq, notice_hits_faq from gogi_notice_faq_board order by notice_no_faq desc LIMIT #{rowStart}, #{rowEnd}
select count(notice_no_faq) from gogi_notice_faq_board where notice_no_faq > 0
mapper.update: update gogi_notice_faq_board set notice_hits_faq = notice_hits_faq +1 where notice_no_faq = #{notice_no_faq}
